metadata.synopsis: Dialogue of a regular thug - member of the Rivington Rats band associated with the Guild. They were hired to protect the merchant's caravan.

0.speaker: Gleeful Clong
0.context: NodeContext: Clearly does not want to engage in any further conversation

1.speaker: Gleeful Clong
1.text: I'm not paid to talk. If you want something, speak to Zenovia.
